name: Manufactured housing: modular approach for mass market buildings
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: In response to the problem of providing mass housing, the manufactured housing model has the benefits of overcoming the issue of lack of skills onsite, waste and limitations to materials use when applied in situ. Is this a model to be rolled out across the UK and what are the design challenges?

presentations.name: Benefits of modern methods of construction
presentations.speakers: Peter Cartwright, Director, Cartwright Picard Architects
